I left 2020 with my life still intact, both figuratively and literally. I didn't lose any of my family or friends due to the onslaught of the pandemic. I remain employed throughout these challenging times. I've been able to financially keep my head up, in spite of missteps.
National crises. Where are they?

More importantly, I've experienced a lot of personal growth as a result of numerous recent life experiences. 2020 was the year of many firsts for me. A side effect of the pandemic that I saw was that ultimately there was a stronger sense of community and openness.
